mapper.insert:
insert all
into HUMAN_STATISTIC( hs_dong,hs_gndr,hs_age_grp,hs_hm_no,hs_date ) values ( #{hvo.hs_dong},#{hvo.hs_gndr},#{hvo.hs_age_grp}, #{hvo.hs_hm_no}, #{hvo.hs_date} )
select * from dual

insert all
into MARKET( mk_nm,mk_dong,mk_classf ) values ( #{mvo.mk_nm},#{mvo.mk_dong},#{mvo.mk_classf} )
select * from dual

insert all
into Market_detail( mkd_no , mkd_date,mkd_price,mkd_prod,mkd_prod_detail,mkd_mk,mkd_mk_dong) values ( get_seq_mkd_no(),#{mdvo.mkd_date},#{mdvo.mkd_price},#{mdvo.mkd_prod}, #{mdvo.mkd_prod_detail},#{mdvo.mkd_mk},#{mdvo.mkd_mk_dong} )
select * from dual
